```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
library(readr)
library(visdat)
library(VIM)
```

```{r}
Airbnb_Dataset <- read_csv("Airbnb_Dataset.csv")
head(Airbnb_Dataset)
```
```{r}
Airbnb_Dataset[sapply(Airbnb_Dataset, is.character)] <- lapply(
  Airbnb_Dataset[sapply(Airbnb_Dataset, is.character)], as.factor)

str(Airbnb_Dataset)
```



```{r}
vis_miss(Airbnb_Dataset)
```

```{r}
#KNN-IMPUTATIN

Airbnb <- kNN(Airbnb_Dataset, variable = c("rating", "price"), k =7)

summary(Airbnb)
```

```{r}
?write.csv
getwd()
write.csv(Airbnb, file = "Airbnb.csv")
```
